tool.name: OGS: RemoveGhostData
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'RemoveGhostData'.
tool.command: if [ "$input" != "None" ] && [ ! -e '${$input.element_identifier}' ]; then ln -s '$input' '${$input.element_identifier}'; fi; RemoveGhostData --input '$input.element_identifier' --output output_1.vtu

param.name: input
param.label: input
param.help: Input (.pvtu). The partitioned input mesh file

tool.help: This tool runs the **RemoveGhostData** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
